welcome.title: Welcome aboard Monifi
welcome.description: You are about to take control of your finances. Find out where your money is going and how you can optimize your savings.

baseQuestions.title: Set up your profile
baseQuestions.description: To personalize your experience, tell us about your priorities and how you currently manage your finances.

financeManagement.label: How do you manage your finances today?

accounts.title: Accounts
accounts.description: Add your wallets and manage all your finances in one place. You can register debit, credit, savings accounts, and even digital wallets to get a complete view of your transactions.

categories.title: Categories
categories.description: Create categories to classify your income and expenses. This will help you understand where your money is coming from and where it is going.

appFeatures.title: You're all set!
appFeatures.description: Welcome aboard! You're now ready to take control of your finances. Dive in to track spending, create budgets, and gain insights into your financial habits. Happy budgeting!

transactions.title: Transactions
transactions.description: Easily track all your financial transactions in one place for a clear overview.

statistics.title: Statistics
statistics.description: Visualize your spending habits and financial progress with insightful charts and graphs.

budgets.title: Budgets
budgets.description: Create and manage budgets to stay on top of your spending and achieve your financial goals.

debts.title: Depts
debts.description: Keep track of your debts and manage repayments effectively.

creditCards.title: Credit cards
creditCards.description: Monitor your credit card spending and balances to maintain financial health.

aiSupport.title: AI Support
aiSupport.description: Get personalized financial advice and insights from our AI assistant.
